title: [Ta'Illistim, Aaendarein Gaer]
description: The gaer ends abruptly at the cliff's edge.  A small cottage clad in fitted dark blue granite bricks is perched safely on a stone outcropping.  A sign swings from the cottage's doorpost, illuminated by a lantern resting on the doorstep.
The gaer ends abruptly at the cliff's edge.  A small cottage clad in fitted dark blue granite bricks is perched safely on a stone outcropping.  A sign swings from the cottage's doorpost.
